title: vandE mAtarm
sahitya:
vazhi kATTi naDattinAn varadarAja perumAn


anupallavi

  pazhi bhAvamAna paDu kuzhiyil vizhundavennaip-parivuDan karaiyETrip-parama bhaktiyirkUTTi


caraNam    poruL ariyAdu maNNaip-poruLena madittEn poi ahankArattil bOdhattai midittEn
aruLoLi kATTI en iruL vinaiyai OTTiyE anjalik-kai nITTi anbamudattai UTTi
